m_szDocTitle: Announcing the CleanTechnica Car of the Year Award | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Announcing the CleanTechnica Car of the Year Award November 30th, 2015 by Kyle Field   This article has been co-written by Kyle Field and Zachary Shahan , with support and suggestions from a few other members of the CleanTechnica community. Just as there are many sites reporting on cars, energy, and the planet out there, many awards have been created to call attention to a variety of focus areas for each of these topics. Over the years, we have looked long and hard specifically for automotive awards that represent what we at CleanTechnica stand for, but have yet to find any that resonate. Havi
